mean_en: willing to agree or to accept something that is wanted or asked for;(of people) easy to control; willing to be influenced by somebody/something
sentence: This girl is amenable to her mother, doing her homework without any argument.
sentence_trans: 小红对妈妈言听计从，没有抱怨做着作业。
word_etyma: amen愉快 + able能...的 → 乐意被控制的 → amenable服从的
